Attribute Description: Uniques identity number to identify each unique review given by the user to a particular product in the dataset
Name of the brand of the product to which user has given review and rating

Category of the product like household essentials, books, personal care products, medicines, cosmetic items, beauty products, electrical appliances, kitchen and dining products, health care products and many more.
Name of the manufacturer of the product
Name of the product to which user has added review or rating
Date on which the review has been added by the user
Whether a particular user has purchased the product or not
Whether a particular user has recommended the product or not
Rating given by the user to a particular product
Review given by the user to a particular product
The title of the review given by the user to a particular product
The residing city of the user
The residing province of the user
The unique identification for individual user in the dataset
The overall sentiment of the user for a particular product (Positive or Negative)
